Returns the name of this slot, such as "Right hand"

equip

void equip(V4ItemCapsule itemCapsule)
Attempts to equip the item. If the item meets this slot's criteria then it is equipped, otherwise it isn't.

Parameters:
itemCapsule - Item to be equipped.

unequip

java.util.List<V4ItemCapsule> unequip()
Free up the slot by unequipping it.

Returns:

isAvailable

boolean isAvailable(V4ItemCapsule itemCapsule)
Checks if the slot is free for this item by checking it's criteria.

Parameters:
itemCapsule - Item for which to check if this slot is available
Returns:
True if item can be equipped, false if not.
